Title: Miss Rebecca Thrall (No. 76)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Jonathan Shapiro, Taylor Martin, Marisa Tam (story editor), Taylor Martin (story editor), Brandon Sonnier (supervising producer), Brandon Margolis (supervising producer)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Ryan Eggold
Plot: The team investigates a number of suspicious police shootings. Ressler is distracted by his outside issues. Red needs Tom's help to re-establish his criminal empire.
